question: The Island of Tahiti, which is to host the surfing events at 2024 Paris Olympics, is located in which ocean?
explanation: The Polynesian island of Tahiti will host the surfing events at the 2024 Paris Olympics. The events will take place at Teahupoo. It was chosen over beaches in southwest France and in Brittany.Tahiti is located in the southern part of the Pacific Ocean. It lies 15,000 kilometres from Paris.
